narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "A" breeders license.  
The license fee should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
The pre-licensing process must be completed within 90 days, including fees processed, or the application fee will be
forfeit and you will be required to wait 6 months to reapply. No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid
USDA license is obtained.
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the owner.
